EngPost_DB.title: Joe Biden Signed NDAA into Law
EngPost_DB.content: President Joe Biden has signed the Fiscal 2023 National Defense Authorization Act into law allotting $816.7 billion to the Defense Department.

EngPost_DB.title: Protesting activity at the bars and clubs in Yangon
EngPost_DB.content: Yangon Revolution Force - YRF (Soft Strike Community) comrades put up stickers with the slogan We Will Be Happier When We Win in the bars and clubs that people commonly go to in Yangon.âœŠSoft Strike Community_Yangon Revolution Force(YRF)âœŠ.

EngPost_DB.title: Teacher Ko Htet Naing Aung[Revo Voices]
EngPost_DB.content: I am still fighting againt Military junta holding the gun left by my fallen brother.âœŠKo Htet Naing Aung.

EngPost_DB.title: Poet Khet Thi[Revo Voices]
EngPost_DB.content: They shot at our heads but they don't know that revolution is in the heart.Khet Thi

EngPost_DB.title: Poet K Za Win
EngPost_DB.content: Even if you and I disagree, I will give my life for you.K Za Win

EngPost_DB.title: Aung San Suu Kyi[Revo Voices]
EngPost_DB.content: The only real prison is fear and the only real freedom is freedom from fear.Aung San Suu Kyi
